h2_title: Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: When they land in areas of the clearing, they will explode into a red mist. This is poisonous, so you'll want to evade the direct blows from the mace and the fungi to avoid poison buildup. Be sure to have Antimiasma Powder equipped to help with any poison buildup during this fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Nine-Capped_Lingzhi_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When they land in areas of the clearing, they will explode into a red mist. This is poisonous, so you'll want to evade the direct blows from the mace and the fungi to avoid poison buildup. Be sure to have Antimiasma Powder equipped to help with any poison buildup during this fight.
